name: Hooster
description:
'''Hooster''' was a three piece [[Rock music|rock]] [[music ensemble|band]] from [[Christchurch]], [[New Zealand]]. The band released its first album, ''Rotate'', in 2003.

The band won a recording [[Grant (money)|grant]] in 2003, to record one song from [[NZ on Air]].{{cn|date=February 2024}} In 2004 they took part in the ''National Anthem'' charity [[telethon]]. In 2005, they went on to win a contest to be opening band at the [[Big Day Out]] Auckland [[music festival]].{{cn|date=February 2024}}
